title: DEWALT 20V MAX XR Oscillating Multi-Tool Kit - Versatile Woodworking Tool
description: The DEWALT 20V MAX XR Oscillating Multi-Tool Kit is a versatile and powerful tool for any woodworking project. Featuring a brushless motor that provides up to 57% more run time over brushed tools, this kit is designed for durability and efficiency. The quick-change accessory system allows you to change blades and attachments without the need for wrenches, saving you time and effort. The dual-grip variable speed trigger gives you ultimate control over your work, ensuring precision and accuracy. This kit includes the oscillating tool, a 2.0Ah battery, a charger, and a convenient storage bag, making it easy to keep all your tools organized and ready for use.
key_features: Brushless Motor for Increased Run Time
Includes Battery, Charger, and Storage Bag
meta_title: DEWALT 20V MAX XR Oscillating Multi-Tool Kit - Versatile Woodworking Tool
meta_description: Shop the DEWALT 20V MAX XR Oscillating Multi-Tool Kit, featuring a brushless motor, quick-change accessory system, and variable speed trigger. Perfect for versatile woodworking tasks.

title: DEWALT 20V MAX XR Oscillating Multi-Tool Kit - Ultimate Control and Efficiency
description: The DEWALT 20V MAX XR Oscillating Multi-Tool Kit offers ultimate control and efficiency for your woodworking projects. The powerful brushless motor provides up to 57% more run time over traditional brushed motors, ensuring that you can work longer without interruptions. The quick-change accessory system allows you to switch out blades and attachments quickly and easily, so you can move seamlessly between tasks. The dual-grip variable speed trigger gives you precise control over the tool, allowing you to work with confidence and accuracy. This comprehensive kit includes the oscillating tool, a 2.0Ah battery, a charger, and a storage bag, making it a must-have for any woodworking enthusiast.
key_features: Includes Battery, Charger, and Storage Bag
Perfect for a Variety of Woodworking Tasks
